## ğŸ“ Page Structure

Each city page includes:

### 1. **Localized Metadata**
```typescript
title: "Keratoconus Treatment in [City], CA | Eye Doctor Near You"
description: "Expert keratoconus treatment in [City], [County]. Serving [Neighborhoods] and surrounding areas..."
keywords: [
  "keratoconus [city]",
  "keratoconus treatment [city]",
  "eye doctor [city]",
  ...neighborhoods
]
```

### 2. **Hero Section**
- City-specific headline
- Distance from office location
- Phone number with city tracking
- Book appointment CTA

### 3. **Local Trust Signals**
- "Serving [City] residents since 1990"
- Neighborhood mentions (3-5 per city)
- Distance/drive time calculation
- Map/directions link

### 4. **Condition Information**
- Keratoconus symptoms
- Treatment options (scleral lenses, cross-linking)
- Why choose us
- Insurance accepted

### 5. **FAQ Section**
- City-specific questions
- Parking/accessibility info
- Insurance coverage in [County]

### 6. **Schema Markup**
- LocalBusiness schema with city context
- MedicalCondition schema
- Breadcrumb schema
- AggregateRating schema

## ğŸ¯ SEO Optimization

### Primary Keywords per City:
```
"keratoconus treatment [city]"
"keratoconus specialist [city]"
"corneal cross-linking [city]"
"scleral lenses [city]"
"eye doctor keratoconus [city]"
```

### Long-Tail Keywords:
```
"keratoconus [neighborhood] [city]"
"progressive keratoconus treatment near [city]"
"corneal specialist [city] [county]"
"irregular cornea [city]"
```

### Internal Linking:
- Main keratoconus page: `/conditions/keratoconus`
- Service pages: `/services/corneal-cross-linking`, `/services/scleral-lenses`
- Other city pages (nearby cities)
- Office location: `/locations`

### Traffic Projections:
| Metric | Conservative | Aggressive |
|--------|-------------|-----------|
| **Monthly Impressions** | 48,000 | 96,000 |

| **Monthly Clicks** | 1,920 | 5,760 |

| **Engaged Visitors** | 1,056 | 3,744 |
| **Conversion Rate** | 8% | 12% |
| **Monthly Leads** | 84 | 449 |

- **Average Patient Lifetime Value:** $3,500

â”‚   â””â”€â”€ Budget: $25/day ($750/month)
â””â”€â”€ ... (8 more city ad groups)
```

### Quality Score Improvement:
- **Before:** 5-7/10 (generic landing page)
- **After:** 8-10/10 (city-specific pages)
- **Expected CPC Reduction:** 30-40%
- **Expected CTR Increase:** 100-150%

## ğŸ” Analytics Tracking

### Key Metrics to Monitor:
1. **Organic Traffic per City Page**
   - Track in Google Search Console
   - Set up city-specific segments in GA4

2. **Conversion Rates by City**
   - Form submissions
   - Phone calls (CallRail tracking)
   - Appointment bookings

3. **User Engagement**
   - Time on page
   - Scroll depth
   - CTA click rates

4. **Local Rankings**
   - Track rankings for each city keyword
   - Monitor SERP features (local pack, FAQs)

### Monthly Reporting Dashboard:
```
